      • moveWorldPlayer

        public void moveWorldPlayer(int dir,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        This moves the players position in the world
        Parameters:
        dir - the integer representation of the direction that the player moves
        x - the initial row that the player is in the world
        y - the initial column that the player is in the world

      • checkBattle

        public int checkBattle(int x,
                       int y)
        Checks to see if the player's next move is the location of an enemy
        Parameters:
        dir - the integer representation of the direction that the player moves
        x - the initial row that the player is in the world
        y - the initial column that the player is in the world
        Returns:
        the direction that the enemy is from the player

      • checkExit

        public int checkExit(int x,
                     int y)
        Checks to see if the player's next move is the exit
        Parameters:
        x - the initial row that the player is in the world
        y - the initial column that the player is in the world
        Returns:
        the direction that the door(exit) is from the player
